current_contact.agency: Washoe Cnty Med Exam Coroners Ofc

case_circumstances:
The decedent was last seen alive on the morning of 7/18/2012.  On 7/19/12 at approximately 1120 hours, a worker from senior services was taking meals to the decedent. Upon noticing the decedent's uneaten meals from the previous day, she performed a welfare check and found the decedent to be unresponsive on the bathroom floor. 911 was called at 1120 hours and Gerlach Fire Department was dispatched at that time. 

The decedent was known as "Richard Lee" in Gerlach, NV for approximately 20 year, and it has been confirmed that he is not "Richard Lee" after social security and birth date records had been searched.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is available and entered
case_other_items_with_body: The decedent was found in a trailer where he had been living as "Richard Lee" for the past 20 years.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
